relationships.description: Lupin is an expert in fighting dementors.
Gryffindor and Ravenclaw are competing against each other in a Quidditch match.
Harry is a member of Gryffindor house.
Lupin has to prepare for the holidays before he can teach Harry how to fight dementors.
Gryffindor participates in a Quidditch match.
